items.title: 1. Quick Start Guide
items.content: Get up and running with OpenAI APIs in minutes. Step-by-step instructions for installation, setup, and your first API call.

items.title: 2. Comprehensive Guides
items.content: Deep dive into advanced features with detailed tutorials, best practices, and real-world examples.

items.title: 3. API Reference
items.content: Complete documentation of all endpoints, parameters, and response formats. Everything you need for integration.

items.title: 4. Examples & Tutorials
items.content: Learn from practical examples and step-by-step tutorials covering common use cases and advanced implementations.

items.title: 5. Community & Support
items.content: Join our vibrant community, get help from experts, and contribute to the ecosystem with discussions and feedback.

footer.title: Ready to Get Started?
footer.subtitle: Choose your path and start building amazing AI applications today.
